mainText: Steve Jobs:Thank you for making my life more passionate! You'll be missed a lot! We've lost the most creative person and business man ever!! The whole world is grieving over you right now. Thank you for making the world a funnier and better place. Thank you for all the innovative products you created, and for making my life happier and easier! Everyone will miss you forever. Thankfully we are granted with Apple, your son and creation. It will always resemble your ideas, strength and success. My best memories and feelings to you and your family. Rest in Peace.
header: Thanks for changing my life and world
author: Andres
